profile.title: PROFILE
profile.name: CHEN YUQING
profile.bio: Web engineer with end-to-end experience in SaaS/enterprise systems, from requirements analysis to design, implementation, and operational improvements. Specialized in API/DB design, performance optimization, CI/CD, and data analytics using TypeScript/Node.js/NestJS for AI-powered mobile applications.
likesList: Understanding complex business domains while balancing technical validity and user value
Driving business requirements into working systems
KPI visualization, issue identification, and improvement for revenue/retention metrics
End-to-end ownership: requirements → design → implementation → testing → operations
